data.name: Checkly
data.description: View of key metrics relating to the health and performance of Checkly.

markdown.markdownText:
**Checkly**

![Checkly](https://www.checklyhq.com/images/text_racoon_logo.afa37391.svg)  

Checkly gives you code-first synthetic monitoring for modern DevOps. Monitor your APIs, service connectivity and apps at a fraction of the price of legacy providers. Powered by Monitoring as Code and Playwright. 

**Details of integrations to bring in Checkly -** [Checkly](https://www.checklyhq.com/docs/integrations/coralogix/)

**Use Cases Covered**
* Total Checks - Passed/Degraded/Failed
* Failing Checks 
* Browser Session Error
* Web Vitals Duration
* Total Duration (Includes All Pages Visited & Any Waits)
* API Response Time 
* Response Time(Includes All Requests Done & Any Waits)
* Days Remaining For SSL Certificate Expiry (By Domain) 
   
**More about performance monitoring of  Checkly** [here](https://www.checklyhq.com/docs/integrations/prometheus-v2/)

widgets.title: Browser Check Duration (Includes All Pages Visited & Any Waits)
